title: Johnson & Johnson to Participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference Johnson & Johnson to Participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference
cleaned_text: Corporate Johnson & Johnson to Participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference Johnson & Johnson to Participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference Johnson & Johnson to Participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference Johnson & Johnson to Participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference NEW BRUNSWICK, N.J., May 5, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ) will participate in the 2017 UBS Global Healthcare Conference on Tuesday, May 23, at the Grand Hyatt New York. Dominic Caruso, Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer will represent the Company in a session scheduled at 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time). This webcast will be available to investors and other interested parties by accessing the Johnson & Johnson website at [www.investor.jnj.com](http://www.investor.jnj.com/). A webcast and podcast replay will be available approximately two hours after the live webcast. SOURCE Johnson & Johnson - Ernie Knewitz, (732) 524-6623, (917) 697-2318 (M); Amy Jo Meyer, 524-6678, (908) 616-6250 (M); Investor Contacts, Joseph
